org.apache.giraph.graph

类 Vertex<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.conf.DefaultImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable<I,V,E,M>
      • org.apache.giraph.graph.Vertex<I,V,E,M>
  • 类型参数:
    I - Vertex id
    V - Vertex data
    E - Edge data
    M - Message data
    所有已实现的接口:
    AggregatorUsage, ImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable<I,V,E,M>, WorkerAggregatorUsage
    直接已知子类:
    AggregatorsBenchmark.AggregatorsBenchmarkVertex, PageRankVertex, RandomMessageBenchmark.RandomMessageVertex, ShortestPathsVertex, WeightedPageRankVertex

    public abstract class Vertex<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends DefaultImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable<I,V,E,M>
implements WorkerAggregatorUsage
    Basic abstract class for writing a BSP application for computation. Giraph will store Vertex value and edges, hence all user data should be stored as part of the vertex value.

        public Vertex()

    • 方法详细资料

      • initialize

        public void initialize(I id,
              V value,
              Iterable<Edge<I,E>> edges)
        Initialize id, value, and edges. This method (or the alternative form initialize(id, value)) must be called after instantiation, unless readFields() is called.
        参数:
        id - Vertex id
        value - Vertex value
        edges - Iterable of edges

      • initialize

        public void initialize(I id,
              V value)
        Initialize id and value. Vertex edges will be empty. This method (or the alternative form initialize(id, value, edges)) must be called after instantiation, unless readFields() is called.
        参数:
        id - Vertex id
        value - Vertex value

      • setEdges

        public void setEdges(Iterable<Edge<I,E>> edges)
        Set the outgoing edges for this vertex.
        参数:
        edges - Iterable of edges

      • compute

        public abstract void compute(Iterable<M> messages)
                      throws IOException
        Must be defined by user to do computation on a single Vertex.
        参数:
        messages - Messages that were sent to this vertex in the previous superstep. Each message is only guaranteed to have a life expectancy as long as next() is not called.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • getSuperstep

        public long getSuperstep()
        Retrieves the current superstep.
        返回:
        Current superstep

      • getId

        public I getId()
        Get the vertex id.
        返回:
        My vertex id.

      • getValue

        public V getValue()
        Get the vertex value (data stored with vertex)
        返回:
        Vertex value

      • setValue

        public void setValue(V value)
        Set the vertex data (immediately visible in the computation)
        参数:
        value - Vertex data to be set

      • getTotalNumVertices

        public long getTotalNumVertices()
        Get the total (all workers) number of vertices that existed in the previous superstep.
        返回:
        Total number of vertices (-1 if first superstep)

      • getTotalNumEdges

        public long getTotalNumEdges()
        Get the total (all workers) number of edges that existed in the previous superstep.
        返回:
        Total number of edges (-1 if first superstep)

      • getEdges

        public Iterable<Edge<I,E>> getEdges()
        Get a read-only view of the out-edges of this vertex. Note: edge objects returned by this iterable may be invalidated as soon as the next element is requested. Thus, keeping a reference to an edge almost always leads to undesired behavior.
        返回:
        the out edges (sort order determined by subclass implementation).

      • getMutableEdges

        public Iterable<MutableEdge<I,E>> getMutableEdges()
        Get an iterable of out-edges that can be modified in-place. This can mean changing the current edge value or removing the current edge (by using the iterator version). Note: if
        返回:
        An iterable of mutable out-edges

      • unwrapMutableEdges

        public void unwrapMutableEdges()
        If a MutableEdgesWrapper was used to provide a mutable iterator, copy any remaining edges to the new OutEdges data structure and keep a direct reference to it (thus discarding the wrapper). Called by the Giraph infrastructure after computation.

      • getNumEdges

        public int getNumEdges()
        Get the number of outgoing edges on this vertex.
        返回:
        the total number of outbound edges from this vertex

      • getEdgeValue

        public E getEdgeValue(I targetVertexId)
        Return the value of the first edge with the given target vertex id, or null if there is no such edge. Note: edge value objects returned by this method may be invalidated by the next call. Thus, keeping a reference to an edge value almost always leads to undesired behavior.
        参数:
        targetVertexId - Target vertex id
        返回:
        Edge value (or null if missing)

      • setEdgeValue

        public void setEdgeValue(I targetVertexId,
                E edgeValue)
        If an edge to the target vertex exists, set it to the given edge value. This only makes sense with strict graphs.
        参数:
        targetVertexId - Target vertex id
        edgeValue - Edge value

      • getAllEdgeValues

        public Iterable<E> getAllEdgeValues(I targetVertexId)
        Get an iterable over the values of all edges with the given target vertex id. This only makes sense for multigraphs (i.e. graphs with parallel edges). Note: edge value objects returned by this method may be invalidated as soon as the next element is requested. Thus, keeping a reference to an edge value almost always leads to undesired behavior.
        参数:
        targetVertexId - Target vertex id
        返回:
        Iterable of edge values

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(I id,
               M message)
        Send a message to a vertex id. The message should not be mutated after this method returns or else undefined results could occur.
        参数:
        id - Vertex id to send the message to
        message - Message data to send. Note that after the message is sent, the user should not modify the object.

      • sendMessageToAllEdges

        public void sendMessageToAllEdges(M message)
        Send a message to all edges.
        参数:
        message - Message sent to all edges.

      • voteToHalt

        public void voteToHalt()
        After this is called, the compute() code will no longer be called for this vertex unless a message is sent to it. Then the compute() code will be called once again until this function is called. The application finishes only when all vertices vote to halt.

      • wakeUp

        public void wakeUp()
        Re-activate vertex if halted.

      • isHalted

        public boolean isHalted()
        Is this vertex done?
        返回:
        True if halted, false otherwise.

      • addEdge

        public void addEdge(Edge<I,E> edge)
        Add an edge for this vertex (happens immediately)
        参数:
        edge - Edge to add

      • removeEdges

        public void removeEdges(I targetVertexId)
        Removes all edges pointing to the given vertex id.
        参数:
        targetVertexId - the target vertex id

      • addVertexRequest

        public void addVertexRequest(I id,
                    V value,
                    OutEdges<I,E> edges)
                      throws IOException
        Sends a request to create a vertex that will be available during the next superstep.
        参数:
        id - Vertex id
        value - Vertex value
        edges - Initial edges
        抛出:
        IOException

        参数:

        value - Vertex value
        抛出:

      • removeVertexRequest

        public void removeVertexRequest(I vertexId)
                         throws IOException
        Request to remove a vertex from the graph (applied just prior to the next superstep).
        参数:
        vertexId - Id of the vertex to be removed.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • addEdgeRequest

        public void addEdgeRequest(I sourceVertexId,
                  Edge<I,E> edge)
                    throws IOException
        Request to add an edge of a vertex in the graph (processed just prior to the next superstep)
        参数:
        sourceVertexId - Source vertex id of edge
        edge - Edge to add
        抛出:
        IOException

      • removeEdgesRequest

        public void removeEdgesRequest(I sourceVertexId,
                      I targetVertexId)
                        throws IOException
        Request to remove all edges from a given source vertex to a given target vertex (processed just prior to the next superstep).
        参数:
        sourceVertexId - Source vertex id
        targetVertexId - Target vertex id
        抛出:
        IOException

      • setGraphState

        public void setGraphState(GraphState<I,V,E,M> graphState)
        Set the graph state for all workers
        参数:
        graphState - Graph state for all workers
